website_summaries.verdict: This is the best combination of power and price.
pros: This model is a good all-around option offering the power and features most people need for pressure-washing tasks around the house
It comes with an onboard soap tank, as well as a quick-connect wand with 15-, 25-, and 40-degree nozzles
cons: Some complaints about faulty nozzles, but company is quick to replace them

customer_reviews.title: Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. It’s really powerful. Did my house siding and removed all the dirt and grime . It’s not that heavy so you can move it around. I had bought the 1900 series one but had to return it for this 1800 series. The 1800 psi is the only one that allows you to use an industrial extension cord with. I needed to use a extension so I could get the other end of the house. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholics fam

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed. It worked well on my driveway and the brick on my house!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is awesome to use with great results. I used to go to the local car wash to get the $20 wash weekly. Since getting this pressure washer I now clean and wax my own cars saving $40 bucks per week not to mention all the other uses for it. I did buy a Quick Disconnect Kit as it makes it so much easier to connect & dis-connect the hoses. Next step is to get an aftermarket hose as the original is terrible and kinks up so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the pressure washer, unhappy with Greenworks
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer does a great job and I've been very happy with how easy it is to use. My issue is with the turbo nozzle. I use it once when we first got it and it worked for all of 3 minutes before it stopped osculating. I reached out to Greenworks and that was a month ago, still no reply and the nozzle has rust on it from ONE use for all of three minutes! Are you kidding me? Bottom line is the pressure washer seems great for the money. Just hope you don't need the turbo nozzle or Greenworks to back the product!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis A.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! It took about 5 minutes to unbox and put together. The hardest part was the pins in the wheels and those too less than a minute each. Using it is just as easy. This was our first power washer though so we, perhaps stupidly, did not realize that when you turn it on nothing happens. You’ve got to turn it on AND start spraying for the power to engage. Once we figured this out it was all down hill from there. Perfect for brick facing, side walks, and even getting old paint off the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Froggie0115

customer_reviews.title: I’m HAPPY! N So is the HUBBY
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, I love everything about this machine, this is worth every penny and by far the best money I have spent . My White House n porch was so DIRTY. What a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ona Benford

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and began testing it. 1st shut down said by 5/8" hose wasn't big enough. Tripped itself twice and then, after using it on the patio for 10 mins, it shut down. Troubleshooting said hot engine should cool down. Never restarted. I've been working with farm and construction equipment for 3-1/2 generations and know, when something is amiss. It also never mentioned in the manual you need pump lubricant for pressure washers. This one received the best rating on Amazon for all the Greenworks units. I'd rather use a little more water and get a machine that works.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: Great product around the house chores
customer_reviews.text: Great little pressure washer to do the jobs around the house! Haven't tried it on my vehicles yet.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah bush

customer_reviews.title: RinseALot
customer_reviews.text: I like that washer is easy to maneuver. I like the different knobs. I like the color. I dont like the amount of power from the washer. Not as powerful as I expected. NOT for anything for heavy duty work like peeling away paint, oil, fence, deck build up and such. This is just good for washing a small car. Rinsing surface dirt off patio. Rinsing windows. I will keep it for those things only.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I haven’t yet used it but next week will be it! It’s a beautiful piece of art to me and it’s mine! I’m excited to use it for the first time. I also ordered the oval brush which I have yet to receive, but I look forward to tackling the work I have to do!
customer_reviews.author: Ss

customer_reviews.title: TRASH. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pressure washer for several months. Originally I had the smaller one which didn't work and the housing leaked. I returned it and spent more to get this model. It has never worked right and the water pressure cycles up and down while the motor wines. WILL NEVER BUY GREEN WORKS CHINEESE TRASH AGAIN. SAVE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First pressure washer every purchased and very happy
customer_reviews.text: I needed to clean a couple of house exteriors and some concrete that was almost black from dirt and tree sap and whatever else gets concrete so dirty... It cleaned it perfectly and pretty fast too. It's pretty quiet for what it is. It's easy to move around. I wanted something to use occasionally but needed to work well. This thing works VERY well. Easy to assemble out of the box, I was up and running in 5 min. The cord is pretty long and they don't recommend using an extension so that's a bit limiting but that didn't cause an issue. It's compact and light but it really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good product Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Good pressure washer used it for a couple hours with soap nozzle and fan nozzle. Also used turbo nozzle on concrete and works very well. Getting power to it in more remote parts of the yard can be challenging but not impossible
customer_reviews.author: ReedTwanger

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Cleans amazingly. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Loca

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pressure washer-I have a gas one and prefer this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too weak
customer_reviews.text: If you need/want a pressure washer, this one is not powerful enough for most jobs. It doesn't even do a good job on washing my car. 1800psi just isn't up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Power washer
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as I expected. Of course not like our gas powered one. It heats water and this doesn’t. Pressure about half of a gas powered one by ya this one is good for money.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I love this power washer. So easy to assemble and fits in a small area of my garage. Got this to power wash my drive, but use it for everything, patio outdoor furniture, car and house. So light and has a long hose and power cord . Simply put , I loved it so much I gave one each to my 2 sons . Although sceptcul at first after first use they were sold.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: works well. hose kinks easily affecting maneuvering. overall works well and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic P

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this, but it is never consistent. Sometimes it works and sometimes it takes 20-30 minutes for the actual full pressure to kick in. And soap doesn’t always come out. Sad spent this much for an inconsistent product.
customer_reviews.author: rachel reeves

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Make sure you clear water hose before attaching.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one before. Greenworks has always been a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper904

customer_reviews.title: Good for light duty cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: The PW-1800 is good for cleaning stuck on dirt. It even removes some rust. But I wish I had gone with the next highest pressure, to make these jobs quicker and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Stuttard

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for a relatively low power
customer_reviews.text: Lower rated power when compared to the previous one I had from a competitor, but with better performance and good construction. My 3rd device from green works.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy and quality piece of equipment. Definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome investment, works beautifully, the only thing I would have done different is gone for more PSI, don’t rake that wrong this pressure washer will do the job, love the soap dispenser just wish there was a shut off valve for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bye dirt and grime!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Suits my needs as works as expected for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Made easy to wash me house and me car mate
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Matmanivong

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose unit.
customer_reviews.text: Originally had the smaller 1600 model and was happy for years. Decided to move up to the 1800. Very happy so far, I use it a-lot.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast getting through 7 years of pet hair and other cleaning solutions used on a rug. Just need the rug to dry out to put it back in house. Looks brand new now. For the price of this machine, I would recommend it to anyone that needs a power washer. This thing will be getting a lot of useage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: you get what you paid for. for the price the product isn't too bad, but i would rather pay more to get a better quality, reliable product. i've had this power washer for less than a year and it is already leaking from the water hose connector. on top of that, the hose and wand sucks.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure washer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good little pressure washer for the price. I mainly use it to clean mud off the sxs, and the 40d nozzle works well for this. It doesn't have the power of a gas model, but that shouldn't be the expectation.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pressure washer. I have used it to pressure wash my patio and patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Leaking oil
customer_reviews.text: Used this the first day and after awhile it started leaking green oil from the motor. I'd say that's a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: tyo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, versatile machine.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is a lot of power in a small package. The before-and-after results are stunning. The variety of settings do everything from a turbo pressure wash on the toughest stains to a car-wash spray that replicates the professional car wash places. It's so much fun to use, my teenage kids are doing chores just for fun -- from pressure washing the driveway to washing the cars. #client
customer_reviews.author: Fergy54

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaking horribly at connection. Trying to work with customer service. They want model number and serial number. Can’t find either on the pressure washer. Can anyone help?
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: power issues after initial use
customer_reviews.text: apparently, after looking online and on youtube - this is a very common problem - these greenworks washers often stop powering after a few uses, and there is nothing you can do to fix it, nor does the warranty cover this . do NOT buy this
customer_reviews.author: david k.

product_meta.title: Greenworks PW-1800 1800 PSI 1.1 GPM Electric Pressure Washer
product_meta.description: Greenworks 2000 PSI 1. 1 GPM pressure washer helps you power through your toughest cleaning jobs: Cars, boats, patios, & much more. Our Greenworks pressure washer comes with a built-in rack which houses the included quick Connect wand attachments, no more miss-placing the nozzles. Greenworks pressure washers making your life easier.
feature_bullets: On-board soap tank. 35 feet power cord with inline GFCI for use on all exterior outlets
Quick connect wand with 15°, 25°, 40°, and soap nozzles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
